messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: The syndicate traitor on board has notified me that his objective is to kill the chemist but he has decided to rejoin the good guys, so this should hopefully be  peaceful shift

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Everyone please turn your suit sensors on and if you dont know how to do that please say so
